SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActiveActor
ActiveActor class represents active actor in game, which is an entity that can move and interact with other entities.
ActiveActorDestructible
ActiveActorDestructible class represents destructible active actor in game, which is entity that can be destroyed.
ActorFactory
ActorFactory interface defines methods for creating various game actors.
ActorImplement
ActorImplement class is responsible for creating various game actors, by implementing the ActorFactory interface.
AssetFactory
AssetFactory interface defines methods for creating various assets, such as background images.
AssetsImplement
AssetsImplement class is responsible for creating and managing assets by implementing the AssetFactory interface.
AssetsLoader<main>
AssetsLoader defines the generic interface for loading assets of specific type.
AudioAssetLoader
AudioAssetLoader class responsible for loading audio assets in game.
AudioManager
AudioManager class manages background music and sound effects, including music volume control, fading effects and toggling audio on/off.
Boss
Boss class represents boss fighter plane in game.
BossFiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for boss plane.
BossHealthBar
BossHealthBar class represents the bossplane health bar and related UI components Including the health bar, health bar background, bossplane's name text label, and shield icon indicating the bossplane's shielding status.
BossMovementStrategy
Implements the MovementStrategy interface which defines movement behavior for boss plane.
BossProjectile
BossProjectile class represents projectile fired by bossplane in game.
BossShielding
This interface defines the contract for managing and applying shielding effects for bossplane.
BossShieldStrategy
Implements the BossShielding interface which manages shielding mechanics for boss plane.
CacheSoundEffect
CacheSoundEffect class manages cache of MediaPlayer instances for sound effects in order to optimise game performance by reusing the existing MediaPlayer objects instead of creating new ones for every single playback.
CollisionManager
CollisionManager class manages collisions between various actors.
ComponentsFactory
ComponentsFactory interface defines methods for creating various UI components and game elements.
ComponentsImplement
ComponentsImplement class is responsible for creating various UI components and game elements by implementing the ComponentsFactory interface.
Controller
Controller class manages flow of the game, including scene transitions, level loading, and audio management.
Destructible
Destructible interface represents destructible entity in the game.
EnemyFiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for enemy plane.
EnemyMovementStrategy
Implements the MovementStrategy interface which defines movement behavior for enemy plane.
EnemyPlane
EnemyPlane class represents enemy plane in game.
EnemyProjectile
EnemyProjectile class represents projectile fired by enemy plane in game.
FighterPlane
FighterPlane class represents fighter plane in game.
FiringStrategy
This interface defines the contract for different firing strategies in game.
GameSettings
The GameSettings class represents settings screen for the game, allowing player to configure sound effects and background music.
HeartDisplay
HeartDisplay class is responsible for managing and displaying heart images in a defined container in horizontal layout.
ImageManager
ImageManager class manages loading and retrieval of image assets in game.
ImageProperties
ImageProperties class is an utility class for applying properties to ImageView.
ImgAssetLoader
ImgAssetLoader is an abstract class responsible for loading image assets in game.
ImgAssetLoaderImpl
ImgAssetLoaderImpl is a concrete implementation of ImgAssetLoader class.
ImgViewFactory
The ImgViewFactory interface defines methods for creating various ImageView components.
ImgViewFactoryImpl
ImgViewFactoryImpl class is responsible for creating various ImageView components by implementing the ImgViewFactory interface.
KeyAction
Enumeration representing possible actions which can be triggered by key events in game.
KeyBindings
KeyBindings class manages mapping between key codes and the corresponding player's plane actions.
KeyEventHandlers
KeyEventHandlers class handles the keyboard events, which includes movements, firing, and pausing.
LevelOne
LevelOne class represents first level of the game.
LevelParent
LevelParent class represents parent class for all levels in game.
LevelScreen
LevelScreen class manages UI elements and interactions across game levels.
LevelThree
LevelThree class represents third level of the game, which features a boss battle.
LevelTwo
LevelTwo class represents second level of the game.
LoseScreen
LoseScreen class displays the game over screen when player loses.
Main
Main class serves as entry point for the application.
MainMenu
MainMenu class displays the main menu of the game.
MovementStrategy
This interface defines the contract for different movement strategies in game.
PauseManager
PauseManager class manages pause state of the game.
PauseScreen
PauseScreen class manages the pause menu UI in game.
Projectile
Projectile class represents projectile in game.
ProjectilesFactory
The ProjectilesFactory interface defines methods for creating various types of projectiles.
ProjectilesImplement
ProjectilesImplement class is responsible for creating various types of projectiles by implementing the ProjectilesFactory interface.
Shield
Shield class represents the shield icon which can be displayed or hidden in game scene.
TransitionScene
TransitionScene class manages transition scene between game levels and states.
UIControlFactory
The UIControlFactory interface defines methods for creating various UI controls.
UIControlFactoryImpl
UIControlFactoryImpl class is responsible for creating various UI controls by implementing the UIControlFactory interface.
UserFiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for userplane.
UserMovementStrategy
Implements the MovementStrategy interface which defines movement behavior for user plane.
UserPlane
UserPlane class represents user's plane in game.
UserProjectile
UserProjectile class represents projectile fired by userplane in game.
WarPlane
Warplane class represents war plane in game.
WarPlaneFiringStrategy
Implements the FiringStrategy interface which defines firing behavior for warplane.
WarPlaneMovementStrategy
Implements the MovementStrategy interface which defines movement behavior for warplane.
WarPlaneProjectile
WarPlaneProjectile class represents projectile fired by warplane in game.
WinScreen
WinScreen class displays win screen when player defeated the game.
